verbose_text: Last, miR-221 and miR-224 have been detected to be up-regulated after anti-TNF treatment in patients with CD in Fujioka et al [XREF_BIBR] work while both have been shown to interfere in IBD related pathways; miR-221 as a down regulator of ICAM1 gene the protein of which has been widely studied in IBD pathogenesis [XREF_BIBR - XREF_BIBR] and miR-224 inducing cell proliferation in ovarian murine cells through SMAD / TGF-beta pathway [XREF_BIBR].
